title: Unraveling the climate neutrality of wood derivatives and biopolymers
content:
RSC Sustain., 2024, Advance Article
DOI: 10.1039/D4SU00010B, Paper
Open Access
  This article is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution 3.0 Unported Licence.
Akshat Sudheshwar, Kealie Vogel, Gustav Nyström, Nadia Malinverno, Monica Arnaudo, Carlos Enrique Gómez Camacho, Didier Beloin-Saint-Pierre, Roland Hischier, Claudia Som
This work compares fossil-based polymers to wood derivatives and polylactic acid using a lifecycle scenario analysis. The aim is to unravel the climate neutrality and advantages of bio-based polymers like wood derivatives.
To cite this article before page numbers are assigned, use the DOI form of citation above.
